STEPS TO REPRODUCE:
1) Open a cvs repository on dev.eclipse.org
2) To go
HEAD>org.eclipse.jdt.ui.tests.refactoring>resources>MoveInstanceMethod>canMove>test0>in>A.java
3) Select Show annotation and you should get the NPE.

4) Then if you click on the entry in the CVS Annotate view for A.java you get
the following stack trace:
